# renderingAttributesValidator

**Instance Property**

A callback block that the framework invokes whenever the text layout manager needs to validate the rendering attributes for the range.

## Declaration

```swift
var renderingAttributesValidator: ((NSTextLayoutManager, NSTextLayoutFragment) -> Void)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The validator uses [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSTextLayoutManager/setRenderingAttributes(_:for:)] to fill the rendering attributes appropriate for the range inside `textLayoutFragment`.

## Configuring global layout manager options

- **layoutQueue**: The queue that the framework dispatches layout operations on.
- **usesFontLeading**: A Boolean value that controls whether the framework uses the leading information specified by the font when laying out text.
- **usesHyphenation**: A Boolean values that controls whether the text layout manager attempts to hyphenate when wrapping lines.
- **limitsLayoutForSuspiciousContents**: A Boolean value that controls internal security analysis for malicious inputs and activates defensive behaviors.
